name: flutterclient
description: Flutter Client The Flutter Client is a mobile app for the JVx framework. It's super generic and renders work-screens dynamically. The app supports all layout features of JVx and comes with a default menu and login mechanism. It's designed as standalone app and also as library. This means that you can easily extend the library and create your own app.

scripts.copyBuild: run-s copyBuildWeb && run-s copyBuildAndroid && run-s copyBuildIos
//: *) Updates version info from pubspec.yaml to app_version.json and sets current date and commit
*) Builds iOS, Adnroid and Web to /deploy folder
*) Updates version info from pubspec.yaml to app_version.json and sets current date and commit
*) Builds Adnroid and Web only to /deploy folder
scripts.build: flutter clean && run-s update-version && run-s update-version && run-s buildAndroid && run-s buildIos && run-s buildWeb && run-s copyBuild
scripts.buildAndroidAndWebOnly: flutter clean && run-s update-version && run-s buildAndroid && run-s buildWeb && run-s copyBuild
